_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The characteristics of a person with spe: And seeing, they say ‘I don’t see.’
They deliberately lie for the sake of themselves or another, or for some trivial worldly reason.
Not knowing, they say ‘I don’t know.’
Not seeing, they say ‘I don’t see.’
They don’t deliberately lie for the sake of themselves or another, or for some trivial worldly reason.
Speaks in a way that’s mellow, pleasing to the ear, lovely, going to the heart, polite, likable and agreeable to the people.
